scripts.bubbleprof:
NODE_ENV=production clinic bubbleprof --autocannon [ -c 10 -d 10 /healthcheck ] -- node -r dotenv/config dist/server.js && echo '

Remember to clean up files in .clinic and node_trace.*.log
'
scripts.build: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build-dev: npm run build-sass && npm run build-ts && npm run copy-assets
scripts.build-sass: rm -rf dist/public/style.css && sass --load-path=node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk --no-source-map src/assets/scss/application.scss dist/public/style.css --style compressed
scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -u 1 src/**/*.njk dist/ src/locales/**/** dist/ src/config/*.txt dist/ && npm run copy-scripts
scripts.copy-scripts: rm -r dist/public/scripts || true && mkdir -p dist/public/scripts && cp node_modules/govuk-frontend/dist/govuk/govuk-frontend.min.js node_modules/@govuk-one-login/frontend-analytics/lib/analytics.js dist/public/scripts && cp -r src/assets/javascript/* dist/public/scripts/
scripts.doctor:
NODE_ENV=production clinic doctor --autocannon [ -c 10 -d 10 /healthcheck ] -- node -r dotenv/config dist/server.js && echo '

Remember to clean up files in .clinic and node_trace.*.log
'
scripts.deep-clean: npm cache clear --force && npm cache clean --force && npm run clean && npm install && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -p "[{name}]" -n "Sass,TypeScript,Node" -c "yellow.bold,cyan.bold,green.bold" "npm run watch-sass" "npm run watch-ts" "npm run watch-node"
scripts.flame:
NODE_ENV=production clinic flame --autocannon [ -c 10 -d  10 /healthcheck ] -- node -r dotenv/config dist/server.js && echo '

Remember to clean up files in .clinic and node_trace.*.log
'
scripts.heap-profiler:
NODE_ENV=production clinic flame --autocannon [ / --method GET -d 120 ] -- node -r dotenv/config dist/server.js && echo '

Remember to clean up files in .clinic and node_trace.*.log
'
scripts.test:integration: rm -rf test/coverage && NODE_ENV=test nyc mocha -r dotenv/config -P tsconfig.mocha.json  "src/**/*-integration.test.ts"
scripts.test:unit: rm -rf test/coverage && NODE_ENV=development nyc mocha -r dotenv/config --exclude "src/**/*-integration.test.ts"  "test/unit/**/*.test.ts" --recursive "src/**/*.test.ts"
scripts.test: rm -rf test/coverage && NODE_ENV=development nyc mocha -r dotenv/config  "test/unit/**/*.test.ts" --recursive "src/**/*.test.ts"
